sentences.en: "You're standing in the way," she said. "Would you mind moving aside"
sentences.cn: .。。“你挡着道了，”她说，“麻烦你让一下。”

sentences.en: Attending the memorial service was a moving experience .
sentences.cn: 参加这次追悼仪式是一次十分感人的经历。

sentences.en: Companies are moving jobs to towns with a lower cost of living.
sentences.cn: 各公司正在把工作岗位转移至生活费用较低的城镇。

sentences.en: Don't try to get on or off a moving train!
sentences.cn: 火车运行时请勿上下车！

sentences.en: Forces were moving in on the town of Knin.
He detected a ship moving down the starboard side of the submarine.
sentences.cn: 他发现有一艘船正在潜艇的右侧航行。

sentences.en: He is moving ever closer to drawing his pension.
He joined Sanders Roe, moving on later to become General Manager.
sentences.cn: 他加入了桑德斯·罗公司，后来一路晋升至总经理。

sentences.en: He told the children to start moving clockwise around the room.
sentences.cn: 他让孩子们开始按顺时针方向绕着房间走。

sentences.en: He was moving with surprising speed for a man of his years.
sentences.cn: 他的行动速度对于他那个年纪的人来说很是惊人。

sentences.en: He was stuck in a line of slow-moving traffic.
sentences.cn: 他陷在缓缓移动的车流里了。

sentences.en: Instead of moving at his usual stately pace, he was almost running.
sentences.cn: 他没像平时那样优雅庄重地走着，而是几乎跑了起来。

sentences.en: Keep away from the doors while the train is moving.
sentences.cn: 列车运行过程中要远离车门。

sentences.en: New owners will have to wait until September before moving in.
sentences.cn: 新业主要等到9月份才能入住。

sentences.en: She travels con-stantly, moving among her several residences around the world.
sentences.cn: 她经常旅行，穿梭于她在世界各地的多处住所。

sentences.en: The train was moving now at a snail's pace.
sentences.cn: 火车这会儿走得跟蜗牛一样慢。

words.tran_cn: 动产的；可移动的；不固定的
原动力；鼓动者；搬运公司；搬家工人
移动，移动到；感动（move的过去式，过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 运转部件；可动部分

trans.tran_en: making you feel strong emotions, especially sadness or sympathy

trans.tran_cn: 移动，转变，前进，采取行动，搬家（move的现在分词）
